name: Rush Band
description:
you need to invite musicians to form a band in up to thirty seconds and each level things get more complicated.

use W, A, S, D to move and E to interact.

my second game, made for my second game jam - Mix and Game Jam - is a game that mixes Procedual Level Generation, like a good Roguelike, with race against time and puzzle elements.

the entire game was done in less than 48 hours, all assets, music, everything. all feedback is very welcome.
